thread.title: Typical Premier Inn - good value
thread.title_full: Typical Premier Inn - good value - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: tridentjerry
title: Typical Premier Inn - good value
text: This hotel is consistent with the Premier Inn offering in the UK. A good hotel for the price, with friendly staff, a comfortable room and bed, refreshing shower, and good breakfast. Short walk from Tower Hill and Fenchurch Street stations and close to Tower Bridge, The Tower of London, St Catherine's Dock and other London attractions.
